From MetaCoq Require Import utils Ast AstUtils Environment.

Deriving a compact induction principle for terms

Allows to get the right induction principle on lists of terms appearing in the term syntax (in evar, applications, branches of cases and (co-)fixpoints.
Custom induction principle on syntax, dealing with the various lists appearing in terms. 
forall P : term -> Prop,
(forall n : nat, P (tRel n)) ->
(forall i : ident, P (tVar i)) ->
(forall (n : nat) (l : list term),
 Forall P l -> P (tEvar n l)) ->
(forall s : Universe.t, P (tSort s)) ->
(forall t : term,
 P t ->
 forall (c : cast_kind) (t0 : term),
 P t0 -> P (tCast t c t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (tProd n t t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (tLambda n t t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t ->
 forall t0 : term,
 P t0 ->
 forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tLetIn n t t0 t1)) ->
(forall t : term,
 P t ->
 forall l : list term, Forall P l -> P (tApp t l)) ->
(forall (s : kername) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tConst s u)) ->
(forall (i : inductive) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tInd i u)) ->
(forall (i : inductive) (n : nat) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tConstruct i n u)) ->
(forall (ci : case_info) (t : predicate term),
 tCasePredProp P P t ->
 forall t0 : term,
 P t0 ->
 forall l : list (branch term),
 tCaseBrsProp P l -> P (tCase ci t t0 l)) ->
(forall (s : projection) (t : term),
 P t -> P (tProj s t)) ->
(forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat),
 tFixProp P P m -> P (tFix m n)) ->
(forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat),
 tFixProp P P m -> P (tCoFix m n)) ->
(forall i : Int63.int, P (tInt i)) ->
(forall f : PrimFloat.float, P (tFloat f)) ->
forall t : term, P t


forall P : term -> Prop,
(forall n : nat, P (tRel n)) ->
(forall i : ident, P (tVar i)) ->
(forall (n : nat) (l : list term),
 Forall P l -> P (tEvar n l)) ->

(forall t : term,

 P t0 -> P (tCast t c t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (tProd n t t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (tLambda n t t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t ->
 forall t0 : term,
 P t0 ->
 forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tLetIn n t t0 t1)) ->
(forall t : term,
 P t ->
 forall l : list term, Forall P l -> P (tApp t l)) ->
(forall (s : kername) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tConst s u)) ->
(forall (i : inductive) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tInd i u)) ->
(forall (i : inductive) (n : nat) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tConstruct i n u)) ->

 tCasePredProp P P t ->
 forall t0 : term,

P:term -> Prop
H:forall n : nat, P (tRel n)
H0:forall i : ident, P (tVar i)
H1:forall (n : nat) (l : list term),
Forall P l -> P (tEvar n l)
H2:forall s : Universe.t, P (tSort s)
H3:forall t0 : term,
P t0 ->
forall (c : cast_kind) (t1 : term),
P t1 -> P (tCast t0 c t1)
H4:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->
forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tProd n t0 t1)
H5:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->
forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tLambda n t0 t1)
H6:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->
forall t1 : term,
P t1 ->
forall t2 : term, P t2 -> P (tLetIn n t0 t1 t2)
H7:forall t0 : term,
P t0 ->
forall l : list term, Forall P l -> P (tApp t0 l)
H8:forall (s : kername) (u : list Level.t),
P (tConst s u)
H9:forall (i : inductive) (u : list Level.t),
P (tInd i u)
H10:forall (i : inductive) (n : nat) (u : list Level.t), P (tConstruct i n u)
H11:forall (ci : case_info) (t0 : predicate term),
tCasePredProp P P t0 ->
forall t1 : term,
P t1 ->
forall l : list (branch term), tCaseBrsProp P l -> P (tCase ci t0 t1 l)
H12:forall (s : projection) (t0 : term), P t0 -> P (tProj s t0)
H13:forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat), tFixProp P P m -> P (tFix m n)
H14:forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat), tFixProp P P m -> P (tCoFix m n)
H15:forall i : Int63.int, P (tInt i)
H16:forall f : PrimFloat.float, P (tFloat f)
t:term
P t

P:term -> Prop
auxt:forall t0 : term, P t0
H:forall n : nat, P (tRel n)
H0:forall i : ident, P (tVar i)
H1:forall (n : nat) (l : list term),
Forall P l -> P (tEvar n l)
H2:forall s : Universe.t, P (tSort s)
H3:forall t0 : term,
P t0 ->
forall (c : cast_kind) (t1 : term),
P t1 -> P (tCast t0 c t1)
H4:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->
forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tProd n t0 t1)
H5:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->
forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tLambda n t0 t1)
H6:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->
forall t1 : term,
P t1 ->
forall t2 : term, P t2 -> P (tLetIn n t0 t1 t2)
H7:forall t0 : term,
P t0 ->
forall l : list term, Forall P l -> P (tApp t0 l)
H8:forall (s : kername) (u : list Level.t),
P (tConst s u)
H9:forall (i : inductive) (u : list Level.t),
P (tInd i u)
H10:forall (i : inductive) (n : nat)
  (u : list Level.t), P (tConstruct i n u)
H11:forall (ci0 : case_info) (t0 : predicate term),
tCasePredProp P P t0 ->
forall t1 : term,
P t1 ->
forall l : list (branch term),
tCaseBrsProp P l -> P (tCase ci0 t0 t1 l)
H12:forall (s : projection) (t0 : term),
P t0 -> P (tProj s t0)
H13:forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat),
tFixProp P P m -> P (tFix m n)
H14:forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat),
tFixProp P P m -> P (tCoFix m n)
H15:forall i : Int63.int, P (tInt i)
H16:forall f : PrimFloat.float, P (tFloat f)
ci:case_info
puinst:Instance.t
pcontext:list aname
preturn, t:term
branches:list (branch term)
aux_pparams:forall pparams : list term,
All P pparams
forall pparams : list term, All P pparams

  intros []; constructor; [apply auxt|apply aux_pparams].
Defined.


P:term -> Prop
(forall t : term, wf t -> P t) ->
forall l : list term, Forall wf l -> Forall P l

P:term -> Prop
IH:forall t0 : term, wf t0 -> P t0
lift_to_list:forall l0 : list term,
Forall wf l0 -> Forall P l0
t:term
l:list term
H:Forall wf (t :: l)
Forall wf l
 now inversion_clear H.
Defined.

forall l : list term,
Forall (fun t : term => wf t -> P t) l ->

P:term -> Prop
Forall wf [] -> Forall P []
P:term -> Prop
x:term
l:list term
H:wf x -> P x
H0:Forall (fun t : term => wf t -> P t) l
IHForall:Forall wf l -> Forall P l
Forall wf (x :: l) -> Forall P (x :: l)
 
P:term -> Prop
x:term
l:list term
H:wf x -> P x
H0:Forall (fun t : term => wf t -> P t) l
IHForall:Forall wf l -> Forall P l
Forall wf (x :: l) -> Forall P (x :: l)

  
P:term -> Prop
x:term
l:list term
H:wf x -> P x
H0:Forall (fun t : term => wf t -> P t) l
IHForall:Forall wf l -> Forall P l
H2:wf x
H3:Forall wf l
Forall P (x :: l)
 
P:term -> Prop
x:term
l:list term
H:wf x -> P x
H0:Forall (fun t : term => wf t -> P t) l
IHForall:Forall P l
H2:wf x
H3:Forall wf l
Forall P (x :: l)

  constructor; auto.
Qed.

Ltac inv H := inversion_clear H.

forall P : term -> Prop,
(forall n : nat, P (tRel n)) ->
(forall i : ident, P (tVar i)) ->
(forall (n : nat) (l : list term),
 Forall P l -> P (tEvar n l)) ->
(forall s : Universe.t, P (tSort s)) ->
(forall t : term,
 P t ->
 forall (c : cast_kind) (t0 : term),
 P t0 -> P (tCast t c t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (tProd n t t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (tLambda n t t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t ->
 forall t0 : term,
 P t0 ->
 forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tLetIn n t t0 t1)) ->
(forall t : term,
 isApp t = false ->
 wf t ->
 P t ->
 forall l : list term,
 l <> [] -> Forall wf l -> Forall P l -> P (tApp t l)) ->
(forall (s : kername) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tConst s u)) ->
(forall (i : inductive) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tInd i u)) ->
(forall (i : inductive) (n : nat) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tConstruct i n u)) ->
(forall (ci : case_info) (p0 : predicate term),
 tCasePredProp P P p0 ->
 forall t : term,
 P t ->
 forall l : list (branch term),
 tCaseBrsProp P l -> P (tCase ci p0 t l)) ->
(forall (s : projection) (t : term),
 P t -> P (tProj s t)) ->
(forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat),
 tFixProp P P m -> P (tFix m n)) ->
(forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat),
 tFixProp P P m -> P (tCoFix m n)) ->
(forall i : Int63.int, P (tInt i)) ->
(forall f : PrimFloat.float, P (tFloat f)) ->
forall t : term, wf t -> P t


forall P : term -> Prop,
(forall n : nat, P (tRel n)) ->
(forall i : ident, P (tVar i)) ->
(forall (n : nat) (l : list term),
 Forall P l -> P (tEvar n l)) ->
(forall s : Universe.t, P (tSort s)) ->
(forall t : term,
 P t ->
 forall (c : cast_kind) (t0 : term),
 P t0 -> P (tCast t c t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (tProd n t t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (tLambda n t t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t ->

H8:forall t1 : term,
isApp t1 = false ->
wf t1 ->
P t1 ->
forall l0 : list term,
l0 <> [] ->
Forall wf l0 -> Forall P l0 -> P (tApp t1 l0)

P (tConst s u)

P (tInd i u)
H11:forall (i : inductive) (n : nat)
  (u : list Level.t), P (tConstruct i n u)

P:term -> Prop

Forall
  (fun def : def term =>
   wf (dtype def) /\ wf (dbody def)) l
 now inv H18.
Qed.

Definition tCaseBrsType {A} (P : A -> Type) (l : list (branch A)) :=
  All (fun x => P (bbody x)) l.

Definition tFixType {A} (P P' : A -> Type) (m : mfixpoint A) :=
  All (fun x : def A => P x.(dtype) * P' x.(dbody))%type m.


forall P : term -> Type,
(forall n : nat, P (tRel n)) ->
(forall i : ident, P (tVar i)) ->
(forall (n : nat) (l : list term),
 All P l -> P (tEvar n l)) ->
(forall s : Universe.t, P (tSort s)) ->
(forall t : term,
 P t ->
 forall (c : cast_kind) (t0 : term),
 P t0 -> P (tCast t c t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (tProd n t t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (tLambda n t t0)) ->
(forall (n : aname) (t : term),
 P t ->
 forall t0 : term,
 P t0 ->
 forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tLetIn n t t0 t1)) ->
(forall t : term,
 P t -> forall l : list term, All P l -> P (tApp t l)) ->
(forall (s : kername) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tConst s u)) ->
(forall (i : inductive) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tInd i u)) ->
(forall (i : inductive) (n : nat) (u : list Level.t),
 P (tConstruct i n u)) ->
(forall (ci : case_info) (p0 : predicate term),
 tCasePredProp P P p0 ->
 forall t : term,
 P t ->
 forall l : list (branch term),
 tCaseBrsType P l -> P (tCase ci p0 t l)) ->
(forall (s : projection) (t : term),
 P t -> P (tProj s t)) ->
(forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat),
 tFixType P P m -> P (tFix m n)) ->
(forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat),
 tFixType P P m -> P (tCoFix m n)) ->
(forall i : Int63.int, P (tInt i)) ->
(forall f : PrimFloat.float, P (tFloat f)) ->
forall t : term, P t

X1:forall (n : nat) (l : list term),
All P l -> P (tEvar n l)
X2:forall s : Universe.t, P (tSort s)
X3:forall t0 : term,
P t0 ->
forall (c : cast_kind) (t1 : term),
P t1 -> P (tCast t0 c t1)
X4:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->
forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tProd n t0 t1)
X5:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->
forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tLambda n t0 t1)
X6:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->
forall t1 : term,
P t1 ->

P (tInd i u)

X14:forall (m : mfixpoint term) (n : nat), tFixType P P m -> P (tCoFix m n)
X15:forall i : Int63.int, P (tInt i)
X16:forall f : PrimFloat.float, P (tFloat f)
t:term
P t

P:term -> Type
auxt:forall t0 : term, P t0
X:forall n : nat, P (tRel n)
X0:forall i : ident, P (tVar i)
X1:forall (n : nat) (l : list term),
All P l -> P (tEvar n l)
X2:forall s : Universe.t, P (tSort s)
X3:forall t0 : term,
P t0 ->

P t1 -> P (tCast t0 c t1)
X4:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->
forall t1 : term, P t1 -> P (tProd n t0 t1)
X5:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),
P t0 ->

X6:forall (n : aname) (t0 : term),

aux_pparams:forall pparams : list term,
All P pparams
forall pparams : list term, All P pparams

  intros []; constructor; [apply auxt|apply aux_pparams].
Defined.
